title: Brand: AcuRite / Part #: 01095M
body_html:
Item #: 67733717
Brand: AcuRite
Model #: 01095M

Product Specifications

Measures Temperature; Humidity
Wifi Capability No
Lightning Detector No
Measures Indoor Temperature Yes
Anemometer No
Measures Indoor Humidity Yes
Moon Phases No
Minimum Temperature (C - 2 Decimals) 0.00
Minimum Temperature (Deg F - 3 Decimals) 32.000
Maximum Temperature C 50.00
Power Source (3) AA Batteries
Maximum Temperature (F) ( - 0 Decimals) 122.000
Minimum Humidity (Percent) 0
Maximum Humidity (Percent) 99
Temperature Accuracy +/- 2 F
Humidity Accuracy +/-4% from 10-20% RH; +/-3% from 20-80% RH; +/-4% from 80-90% RH; +/-5% from 90-99% RH; +/-5% from 0-10% RH
Display Type Digital LCD
Display Width (Decimal Inch) 3.5
Display Height (Decimal Inch) 3.1500
Features Digital Display Sensor: The wireless temperature and humidity sensors can be placed inside your home and display the location?s temperature and humidity levels; Monitor the Locations You Care About Most: Monitor the temperature and humidity levels from four locations in your home right from one compact wireless display; Digital Clock: Also displays the time, the date, and day of week; Multiple Placement Options: The display features a fold-out stand for tabletop placement and an integrated keyhole for wall easy wall mounting; AcuRite Multilocation Temperature and Humidity Station with (3) Indoor Wireless Sensors; Alerts You When Conditions Exceed Your Presets: The digital display can be programmed to notify you with a visual alert and audible alarm if temperature or humidity levels exceed a preset range in any monitored area
